thread.section_title: De beste restaurants in Los Angeles | (Bijgewerkt in 2023)
thread.title: Baran’s 2239 Restaurant - Hermosa Beach, , CA | OpenTable
thread.title_full: Baran’s 2239 Restaurant - Hermosa Beach, , CA | OpenTable

author: anonymous
text: First time here. Overall, quite good. Food mostly excellent. Only miss was the Kingfish sashimi which was overly sauced and spicy, which overwhelmed the delicate flavor of the fish. Service was excellent, though no recognition that we were celebrating an anniversary and noted such on the reservation. Cost was definitely on the high side for the South Bay.
